directions.step:
Boild one gal of water, add syrup, stir until dissolved. Return to heat. Add 3 oz hallertauer hops and boild for 30-45 min. In last 5-10 minutes of boil, add the saaz hops. Add to 4 gal of cold water. When cooled to below 80 degrees, pitch yeast. Fermentation at 45-55 degrees should go as follows: 10-14 days in primary fermenter, 2-3 weeks in secondary and 6 weeks in the bottle. OSG: 1040-1050 FSG: 1008-1012
